Create a random scatterplot for guessing correlations

guess_cor.Rd

Create a random scatterplot for guessing correlations

Usage

guess_cor(
  seed = NA,
  nonp = FALSE,
  skew = nonp,
  rank = FALSE,
  answer = c("interactive", "show", "hide"),
  return.data = FALSE
)

Arguments

seed

the random seed used in creating the data.

nonp

should non-parametric correlations be shown?

skew

should extra skew be randomly added?

rank

should the data set be converted to ranks before plotting and computing correlations?

answer

option to control interactivity; options are "interactive", "show", and "hide".

return.data

normally the plot is returned; if TRUE, the data is returned instead.
